title: ATMS-KD: Adaptive Temperature and Mixed Sample Knowledge Distillation for a Lightweight Residual CNN in Agricultural Embedded Systems
summary: This study proposes ATMS-KD (Adaptive Temperature and Mixed-Sample Knowledge Distillation), a novel framework for developing lightweight CNN models suitable for resource-constrained agricultural environments. The framework combines adaptive temperature scheduling with mixed-sample augmentation to transfer knowledge from a MobileNetV3 Large teacher model (5.7\,M parameters) to lightweight residual CNN students.
